gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 116, Nets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Nets, 116-104. LeBron James had an incredible performance with 40 points (13-17 FG, 9-10 3PT FG), along with five assists and seven rebounds. Anthony Davis (24 points, 14 rebounds) and Rui Hachimura (20 points, 10 rebounds) totaled 44 points. Cam Thomas led Brooklyn with 30 points in the loss. The Lakers improve to 42-33 as the Nets fall to 29-46.
